title: Enhancing Adult Basic Mathematics Competencies Through Pattern-Based Educational Technology Design in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills, foundational ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Supporting multilingual learners, fostering real-world problem-solving skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy through pattern-based instructional design.
Learners can identify and utilize at least three educational technology environments linked to software architecture.
Learners can produce outcomes that solve real-life problems (e.g., budget management, measurement calculations) mathematically through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
